meanings.sent1: The ball trundles down the hill.
meanings.sent2: The wheel trundles smoothly on the road.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy trundles after the bouncing ball.
meanings.sent4: Time trundles forward, never looking back.
meanings.sent5: The old cart trundles noisily through the cobblestone streets.

meanings.sent1: The trundles on the toy car spin quickly.
meanings.sent2: The trundles on the suitcase make it easy to move.
meanings.sent3: The tiny trundles on the chair legs help protect the floor.
meanings.sent4: The trundles on the cart squeak as it moves.
meanings.sent5: The trundles on the trolley glide silently on the tracks.

meanings.sent1: The bear trundles through the forest, searching for food.
meanings.sent2: The elderly man trundles along with his walker.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy cat trundles lazily across the room.
meanings.sent4: The heavy clouds trundles across the sky, blocking the sun.
meanings.sent5: The tired elephant trundles back to its resting place after a long day.
